short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read your bookmarks with a glance

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to generate an undirected graph with each bookmark and folder represented as a node. With this tool you can easily view your bookmarks and hierarchy as a whole.
